metadata.title: Discussion to be made after receiving demands of PTI: Irfan Siddiqui

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 1 (APP): Pakistan Muslim League-N, Senator Irfan ul Haque Siddiqui on Wednesday said that discussion would be made after receiving demands of Pakistan Tehreek e Insaf (PTI). We will have consultation with coalition partners and PML-N leadership regarding PTI charter of demands (CoD), he said while talking to a private television channel. The legal help can also be taken on the matter of PTI CoD, he added. In reply to a question about judicial commission on May 9 and November 26, he said, we will seek legal assistance regarding issues that held on May 9 riots, and November 26. The homework would also be completed before taking the decisions and reviewing the demands of PTI leadership, he stated.
content.summary: Senator Irfan ul Haque Siddiqui stated that discussions regarding the demands of Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) would take place after their receipt. Consultation with coalition partners and the PML-N leadership will be conducted, and legal assistance may be sought concerning the PTI's charter of demands.
